          <title>
            <string language="sl">Amerika - motivacija</string>
            <string language="en">America - motivation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerika - Beweggrund</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Amérique - motivation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">América - motivation</string>

          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zabavna vaja za motivacijo in zaključek obravnave geografije Amerike.</string>
            <string language="en">Fun exercise for motivation when teaching geography of America.</string>

          </description>
